Name: Golden Retriever
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This powerful, straw yellow cocktail offers a myriad of flavours. Benefitting from the dilution of a long stir and/or the addition of a dash of water.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dick Bradsell at Alfred's, London, England. Dick's original recipe was equal parts without the water and was served straight-up in a Martini glass.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Retriever contains 136 calories
